delfin_gruppe10.domainlogic

Class MasterSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • delfin_gruppe10.domainlogic.MasterSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MasterInterface

    public class MasterSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements MasterInterface
    MasterSystem The class acts as a controller class that communicates between a dataAccessor and the UI. It contains the logic, necessary for taking data from the dataAccessor and transforming it into what the UI needs. Also, this class implements an interface that makes sure the contract is unbroken, that is to say, that it follows the specifications given in the use-case diagram. The two constant String variables in the beginning can be changed if necessary to use different paths for the data files

        Parameters:

      • addMember

        public void addMember(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String birthdate,
                      java.lang.String address,
                      java.lang.String postnr,
                      java.lang.String city,
                      java.lang.String phone,
                      java.lang.String mail,
                      boolean active)
        Creates a member with the given basic information and adds it to the list
        Specified by:
        addMember in interface MasterInterface
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the member to create
        birthdate - the birthdate of the member to create (as a String)
        address - the street name and number of the member to create
        postnr - the zipcode of the member to create
        city - the city of the member to create
        phone - the phone number of the member to create (without +45) - in the current version, only Danish phone numbers are allowed
        mail - the email of the member to create
        active - whether the member to create has an active or a passive membership at the club
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if @Member throws it. Also if a member already has the given name or the given email.

      • editMember

        public void editMember(java.lang.String originalName,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String birthdate,
                       java.lang.String address,
                       java.lang.String postnr,
                       java.lang.String city,
                       java.lang.String phone,
                       java.lang.String mail,
                       boolean active)
        Edits an already existing member. Replaces the member's basic information with the given information. If the yearly contingent rises because of a raise in age or because of the member becoming active, the arrears of the member will be updated as well. If the name is changed, the CompetetiveSwimmer equivalent of the member will have its name updated too.
        Specified by:
        editMember in interface MasterInterface
        Parameters:
        originalName - the original name of the member to update
        name - the updated name of the member
        birthdate - the updated birthdate of the member (as a String)
        address - the updated street name and number of the member
        postnr - the updated zipcode of the member
        city - the updated city of the member
        phone - the updated phone number of the member (without +45) - in the current version, only Danish phone numbers are allowed
        mail - the updated email of the member
        active - whether the member to update now has an active or a passive membership at the club
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if @Member throws it. Also if a member already has the given name or the given email.

      • deleteMember

        public void deleteMember(java.lang.String name)
        Attempts to remove a person from the member list. All information about this former member, including results from training and competition, is deleted permanently.
        Specified by:
        deleteMember in interface MasterInterface
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the member to delete

      • registerPayment

        public void registerPayment(java.lang.String name,
                            double amount)
        Register a payment to pay for a part of the arrears for a given member.
        Specified by:
        registerPayment in interface MasterInterface
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the member to register payment for
        amount - the amount of DKK to be paid
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if cloning is unsuccesful, so that the member's arrears information can't be updated.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a member doesn't exist with the given name, or if the given amount is negative or more than what the member owes

      • addTrainingResult

        public void addTrainingResult(CompetetiveSwimmer original,
                              Discipline discipline,
                              java.lang.String time,
                              java.lang.String date)
        Registers a result from a training session if it is the best result of that swimmer in the given discipline. Only one such result per discipline can be registered at a time
        Specified by:
        addTrainingResult in interface MasterInterface
        Parameters:
        original - the member who swam
        discipline - the discipline, the member exercised
        time - the result time - how fast did the member complete the training (formatted MM:SS:mm)
        date - the date of the training session (formatted DD-MM-YYYY)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the time or date is formatted wrongly

      • addCompetetiveResult

        public void addCompetetiveResult(CompetetiveSwimmer original,
                                 Discipline discipline,
                                 java.lang.String time,
                                 java.lang.String date,
                                 java.lang.String competition,
                                 int ranking)
        Registers a result in a given discipline from a competition. All competetive results are saved. If it is the best result of that swimmer in the given discipline (including all his/her results from other competitions as well as training sessions) it will also be registered as so.
        Specified by:
        addCompetetiveResult in interface MasterInterface
        Parameters:
        original - the member who swam
        discipline - the discipline, the member exercised
        time - the result time - how fast did the member complete the competition (formatted MM:SS:mm)
        date - the date of the competition (formatted DD-MM-YYYY)
        competition - the official name of the competition
        ranking - integer representing the official ranking in the given discipline in the given competition
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the time or date is formatted wrongly, or if ranking is less than 1

      • getTop5

        public java.util.ArrayList<CompetetiveSwimmer> getTop5(Discipline d)
        Gets the 5 swimmers in the club with the best personal results in the given discipline (including both training and competetive results) Orders the swimmers by result times in the given discipline, with the fastest swimmers placed highest in the list
        Specified by:
        getTop5 in interface MasterInterface
        Parameters:
        d - the discipline to get top 5 swimmers for
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing the top 5 swimmers in the given discipline, ordered by result time
